item.title: Placeholders In Library Module
item.description: Android Studio projects have multiple modules that are dependent on each other. The most common way is that the app moudule depends on the library module. If the dependent library module will eventually be used as a public SDK for other projects, and some of the internal uses require different values ​​depending on the specific project configuration, you need to use the manifest in the library moudule’s AndroidManifest.xml Placehodlers placeholder.
